short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IMTLazarus Extension for Teachers, providing integration with decision-maker education tools like Edpuzzle, Genially and others.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IMTFusion adds information elements previously collected by IMTLazarus to be displayed on educational platforms as support for the teaching community.

The classification of elements with the possibility of being incorporated according to the educational project are the following:

- Information ((i) of student).
- Link (opening a link in a new tab).
- Synchronization (Export data from the platform to IMTLazarus).
- Identification (IMTFusion logo, know active extension).
- Association (the identity of a student is related to a platform identifier).
- Hiding (certain elements of the platform are removed / hidden).
- Permutation / transformation (elements of the platform are modified).
- Registration / traceability (they serve to quantify specific actions on the platforms).
- Connection (indicates if the device is connected with IMTLazarus to work in the classroom).
- Action (opens a layer to interact with the device, launch educational resources, etc).
- Embedding (representation of the element embedded in the web screen itself. Example: youtube video, image, QR code...).

It incorporates visual support elements in education platforms.
